bookSourceComment:
var v = source.getVariable(),
  link = "https://myaavideonet.neocities.org/aabook.html",
  J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(link)),
  mail1 = "waimanhua@gmail.com",
  mail2 = "momodaqqq@gmail.com",
  mail3 = "bang985211@gmail.com",
  wiki = "https://github.com/momodaqqq/qscxx/wiki";
host =
  1 == v
    ? String(J).match(/url\[0\]="(.*)"/)[1]
    : 2 == v
    ? String(J).match(/url\[1\]="(.*)"/)[1]
    : 3 == v
    ? String(J).match(/url\[2\]="(.*)"/)[1]
    : "";
exploreUrl:

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment)) var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result), url = baseUrl.replace(/book-/, "chapterList-") book = { name: String(J.select(".book_name a").text()) .replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[\(（].*[）\)]/g, ''), author: J.select(".author").text(), kind: String(J.select(".xinxi_content span").text().split(" ")[1]) .replace(/[中已]/g, "") + "," + J.select(".xinxi_content span").text().split(" ")[0] + "," + J.select(".dt_r").text().split(" ")[0], word: String(J.select(".xinxi_content span").text().split(" ")[2]) .replace(/字/, ""), latest: String(J.select(".new_zhangjie1 .dt_l a").text()) .replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)/g, "") .replace(/[\(（【].*?[求更谢乐发订合贺补加推票章字修防kK].*/g, "") + "·" + String(J.select(".new_zhangjie1 .dt_r").text()).replace(/\s.*/, "") + "·\[" + String(org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url)).select(".section_list li")) .split("\n").length + "\]", intro: "
" + String(J.select(".jianjieneirong").html()).replace(/\s/g,"
"), cover: host + "/" + J.select(".book_info_top_l img").attr("src"), url: url }; //java.log(JSON.stringify(book)) book;
ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
1 == v || 2 == v || 3 == v
  ? (java.put("host",host), java.toast("\n♥已设置源变量♥\n源站：" + host))
  : java.toast("\n❗未设置源变量❗\n默认：" + source.bookSourceUrl);
chapterList = java.getElements(".section_list li a");
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName:
text
@js:
result
  .replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)/g, "")
  .replace(/[\(（【].*?[求更谢乐发订合贺补加推票章字修防kK].*/g, "")
